subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Olympic Games (2016)
Television
lead_paragraph: Comcast, which is poised to buy control of NBC, has reason to be cautious about plunging into the Olympics, where the cost of buying media rights in the United States has soared.
snippet: Comcast, which is poised to buy control of NBC, has reason to be cautious about plunging into the Olympics, where the cost of buying media rights in the United States has soared.
